root: ^They can unite people against hardships or create bitter rivalries that destroy friendships.
^Pitting people from different social standings against one another.
^It’s exciting to see someone start from zero, only able to rely on their skill to defeat their opponents.
^Yet… Some go beyond the typical class of people, eager to change the rules to suit them.
^“Hello, Connor Greener. I wish to celebrate my years of friendship with my closest compatriots with a party!"
^"I plan to reveal something surprising by the end, so do be sure to stay. - G.F.”
^One day I got an invitation from Garry Faust, the famed game maker, for a party.
^No special occasion or reason, just a surprise party with some kind of surprise waiting for us.
^Time to see what Garry has in store.
